alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 12:05PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HEAVY RAIN TUESDAY NIGHT AND WEDNESDAY... A couple of waves moving N along a stalled front over the central gulf will bring periods of moderate to heavy rain to the NE gulf coast. As of noon Tuesday 0.88 inches of rain has fallen from the first wave. A lull in rainfall rates between waves will occur Tuesday afternoon and evening. The second wave then moves into the Yakutat area from the south Tuesday night with rates becoming heavy at times again. Additional rainfall Tuesday night through Wednesday afternoon is expected to be 2 to 3 inches with higher amounts at elevation. Streams and rivers will rise steadily through the day Wednesday, but are expected to remain within their banks at this time.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area
